action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gray render makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, the target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) slashing damage, plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) bludgeoning damage if the target is {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Bloody Rampage
entries: When the gray render takes damage, it makes one Claw attack against a random creature within its reach, other than its master.
